subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Boxing
lead_paragraph: The United States qualified fighters in all but one weight class in London, including women in the three female divisions, but there are reasons to doubt a return to the nation’s glory days in the sport.
snippet: The United States qualified fighters in all but one weight class in London, including women in the three female divisions, but there are reasons to doubt a return to the nation’s glory days in the sport.
